Once upon a time, a good-looking hawk  lived in a tree alone. He felt lonely because he had no friends.
One day, he saw a beautiful she-hawk and wanted to marry her. But the she-hawk refused, because he had no friends. "Will you be with me if I make three friends?" he asked. She answered yes.
The hawk flew to look for friends. Along the way, he met some animals, _ a huge bear, a fox and a tiger. He asked them if they could make friends with him. They said, "Of course. Call us when you are _ need and we shall come to your side."
The hawk was very happy. He flew back and became the she-hawk's _ . Some months later after their marriage, they got two baby hawks and had a happy life.
One day, two hungry hunters   came and sat under that tree. They had _ to eat. Suddenly, they heard the baby hawks crying . And then they decided to cah them and eat them.
The parent hawks became worried. So they had to turn to their friends and told them the whole thing . With their help, the two hunters ran away, and the babies became safe.
The hawk thanked his three friends. He found that the she-hawk was very _ in advising him to make friends before marriage.
